directions: In a medium-sized heavy saucepan, combine carrots, water, butter, sugar, salt and dill seed.  Bring to a boil; reduce heat, cover and simmer 25 to 30 minutes, or until carrots are tender and most of the liquid is absorbed.
ingredients: 8 carrots, peeled and sliced into 1 inch pieces
title: Carrots in Dill Butter
